name: Conseal The Deal Long-Wear Full-Coverage Foundation
about: What it is:A long-wearing, lightweight fluid foundation that delivers modern full coverage with a self-setting, natural-matte finish. Vegan and silicone-free..Coverage: Full.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Highlighted Ingredients:- Nasturtium Flower Extract: Limits free-radical damage caused by blue light..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This blendable, buildable foundation feels like a serum, fusing with your skin to visibly even tone, blur pores, smooth texture, and cover imperfections. The silicone- and talc-free formula contains active ingredients to provide blue-light and antioxidant protection while soothing irritation and sensitivity.
ingredients: -Nasturtium Flower Extract: Limits free-radical damage caused by blue light..-Goji Berry: Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants and widely used to reduce visible signs of aging. .-Bisabolo and Ginger Extracts: Soothing anti-irritant ingredients suitable for dry, sensitive skin...Aqua (Water), Isododecane, C9-12 Alkane, Silica, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyhydroxystearate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Propanediol, Magnesium Sulfate, Zinc Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglycerin-6, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Bisabolol, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil), Propylene Carbonate, Lycium Barbarum Seed Oil, Stearic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Zingiber Officinale Root Extract (Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract), Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate. May contain: CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides) CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Prep skin with Set The Stage Hydrating Primer Serum (sold separately) for best results..-Shake well to ensure the most even application...For high-medium to full coverage:.-Apply to the center of your face and blend outward in circular motions with your favorite synthetic foundation brush. .-As the foundation blends into your skin, use a buffing motion to press and stamp the brush in areas where you desire more coverage. .-This formula builds best when applied in thin layers and when each layer is allowed to dry before applying the next. .-For the ultimate airbrushed effect, finish by lightly pressing with a damp beauty sponge to further fuse the foundation into your skin. ..For medium, customizable coverage:.-Apply to the center of your face and blend outward with a damp beauty sponge. .-Press and roll the sponge, focusing on areas where more coverage is desired. ..For the longest wear and most flawless effect throughout the day:.-Finish your complexion by generously misting Glam Guard Long-Wear Setting Spray (sold separately) over your base...Annieu2019s tip: .-When selecting your shade, note that each shade dries down slightly deeper than when applied wet due to the high all-natural pigment content in the formula.

reviews.review_text: I have fair-light skin with cool undertones, so I first ordered this in Almond and Champagne. Covers well - I would say it's medium coverage with natural-matte finish. It's also very comfortable on my sensitive skin - I found this on a best of list for sensitive skin. I'll keep using this for everyday. KVD good apple has also been working well for something fuller coverage and also not irritating.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT BUY IF DRY Winter Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 1st: I have extremely dry skin in the winter to the point of having to use Super Goop's Daily Dose oil sunscreen daily as my moisturizer. I put on heavy cream, and my skin immediately soaks it up & is ready for another layer, so any reviewers who say that this makeup is moisturizing has normal-oily skin, It did not go on like a serum as described. As soon as I brushed it on, it looked chalky and did not absorb into my skin. I let it dry and tried to apply another layer for better coverage and my brush simply moved around the makeup already there because it didn't absorb correctly. I use Tatcha primer. Also, it did not darken, but actually dried lighter, making it look even chalkier.By the end of my teaching day, the only blended  makeup left on my face was my concealer, which looked really weird with the chalky film that stayed put. I'm sticking with my all-day Makeup 4Ever HD Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I felt compelled to write a review for this foundation after realizing there are so few actual customer reviews that aren't incentivized. I have normal to combo skin and I think this is a fantastic product! Yes, this has a thin and watery texture, but the coverage is absolutely there and the texture allows for great blending and a very natural appearance that sets and stays very well. I am very active and my products have to not only look great in person and on camera but also perform and wear well. This foundation works great with the brand's primer and plays well with other products. I apply with a damp Beauty Blender. I really don't understand why people aren't loving on this more! When selecting a shade, be sure to shake well, try a few shades and really let it dry down and set so you can see the true color.

reviews.review_text: This foundation is extremely watery. it is light to medium coverage and minimally buildable. I have oily/combo skin and this foundation creases and lifts within a few hours. it does spread and blend out easily, but I won't be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation in many different ways, these are the conclusions I have come up with:  1- Hard shade match. As others have mentioned, it is difficult to match yourself to the correct shade online. I bought Sunlight which was the correct undertone but a little bit too light. For reference I am the shade C2 in MAC f&b.  2- not full coverage. The product has a hard time adhering to itself since it is so thin which makes it almost impossible to build up in coverage.   3- hard to get an even application. Again, because the product is thin certain areas have a hard time making the foundation cling to it...for me that is around my nose. That being said, certain areas on my face gather too much product and the foundation looks cakey (around my mouth).  4- not dry skin friendly.   5- great mixing foundation to thin out other formulas. I love mixing this with the Nars Sheer glow for a more sheer and natural finish.   6- no smell and great packaging.   Overall.... not a must have. Because I bought this on sale at 50% off I will keep it, but I would not buy it at regular price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this product claims to be full coverage, I have tinted moisturizer with more coverage. The formula while sheer, it also very hard to apply as it doesn't want to stick to itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a fan of this foundation. Itu2019s comes out very watery, didnu2019t cover well and showed every bit of dry skin that is on my face. I wouldnu2019t recommend to anyone, unless your skin is already flawless.

reviews.review_title: Nice But Shade Match Is Hard
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation, but it was a little hard to shade match myself due to the fact that none of the stores around me carry it. I am fair with a sometimes confusing neutral undertone. I ended up going with Almond out of two shades I bought online, it is still slightly too light due to the fact that it dries way lighter than it appears when wet, but I can make it work. I wouldnu2019t consider this full coverage, but definitely builadabl with a nice natural matte finish. I do also love the cleaner ingredients! It does not break me out or irritate my skin at all. My oils do tend to break through after a few hours though (which I personally donu2019t mind) but keep in mind if you are very oily.

reviews.review_title: Might be great for someone else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Not full coverage. More like your skin but better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Review for oily acne-prone skin with hyperpigmentation:   this is either a full coverage face tint OR a light coverage foundation. Not a full coverage foundation (clearly a marketing tactic) It is buildable to a medium coverage at best. If you have redness/discolouration it will even out your skin tone somewhat. If you have dark spots/acne marks/freckles NO, it will not cover those. You will need to go in with a concealer.   Now in terms of performance, it is great for normal to oily skin. Gives a natural/matte finish. However, for oily gals like me, you need to set it on T zones unfortunately. But I won't complain, it is very lightweight. It's a your skin but better kind of product.   Again, not a full coverage foundation. But if you are looking for a light coverage light weight foundation for summer, 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

I didn't find it to be easily buildable due to it's inconsistent application and appearance.  I'm always on the lookout for a good silicone-free foundation.  Unfortunately this one missed the mark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now thatu2019s what I call u201cnatural full coverage!u201d Stayed on me all day. Some full coverage foundations can look like youu2019re wearing a mask. This melts into my skin. Doesnu2019t oxidize and is clean! My new favourite foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is terrible for dry skin. Clings to every fine line I have. Going back immediately.

Best foundation ever. It covers my acne perfectly. Itu2019s so buildable and lightweight. I have very sensitive skin and this foundation does not irritate my skin. So easy to blend. Like a second skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long searched for a clean foundation that checked all my boxes: doesnu2019t make me break out, doesnu2019t slide off, doesnu2019t dry me out, provides full coverage, doesnu2019t make me pasty or orange, and doesnu2019t suffocate my face. This one does it all! I switched over from MILKu2019s liquid foundation and will never look back. This is the first time I feel good about what Iu2019m putting on my face and feel good about how I look at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this foundation looks on my skin. It is very lightweight and lasts all day. The extra bonus is that it is a clean brand! It comes in packaging that is easy to carry in your purse. I am sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just happened to find this in a Sephora store and I had never seen it before. Wow, this stuff is amazing! It seems very thin, but the coverage is fantastic! If my ex-husband's had seen me wearing this, I'd still be married to at least one of them!

The coverage and finish nothing spectacular or nothing you canu2019t get with other department store foundations for a third of the cost. It wore off and started breaking around my nose by midday.   Iu2019ll be sticking with my IlMakiage foundation and will be sending this back for a refund.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a clean product, but found this shade insanely pale even for me and Iu2019m basically translucent. The colour does settle down and itu2019s enough of a match that Iu2019ll use it up, but likely wouldnu2019t repurchase as it tends to dry patchy even with a good primer and proper application. The coverage is decent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. Goes on smooth and has a nice natural finish. Not too matte, not too shiny. I donu2019t set it except under my eyes and it still lasts quite well. I also saw people complaining about the size and Iu2019m not sure why. If you read, it has the same amount of product as other brands. The packaging is just smaller and thatu2019s a good thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like how light it feels, I don't think it's full coverage - more of a medium coverage but looked very natural.  Unfortunately, It just didn't stay matte long enough for my oily skin. Even with my favourite primer and setting powder I still got shiny after a couple of hours.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Toasted Almond - very deep with warm-neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade toasted almond but I honestly didnu2019t like the finish of this foundation. It was patchy and never dried how I wanted it to so I am really not a fan of it. I tried to love it but honestly I couldnu2019t.   I was gifted this by lawless

reviews.review_title: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for the perfect clean foundation for a long time.  The reviews were good on this but it was hard to read a review from someone who actually bought the product. At first I was ready to send it back when I saw how runny the formula was and the color was was lighter than expected initially. I put it on with my fingers and once it started to dry down the color settled and was a perfect match for me.  It is full coverage despite it being so runny. It's very light weight and definitely matte. I didn't have to set it with anything. I have mostly dry skin and it works for me. It stayed nicely all day with normal activity. I used an Ole Hendrickson primer. Took a star off because it is a very small for full-size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t like this foundation, didnu2019t blend well. Also didnu2019t feel like it matched my skin tone even though I took the quiz to see if it would match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was in a panic when my favorite foundation got discontinued (urban decay all-nighteru2026) so have tried many many foundations in hopes of finding something I like that wouldnu2019t give me bad skin reactions (VERY VERY sensitive skin that is prone to millia, painful dryness, splotching-the whole unfortunate enchilada).  I tried a lot of high end replacements-Armani, Lancu00f4me, estee lauder, nars-and they were all bad (for me anyway) UNTIL I saw this and itu2019s u201ccleanu201d label so even though Iu2019d never heard of this brand, decided to give it a gou2026THANK GOODNESS I DID.  I now much prefer it over my beloved UD (my hoarded bottles-worth a fortune-sit unused) which says a lot since thatu2019s been my go to for YEARS!  Iu2019m 50+ with an extremely pale complexion and am grateful this is light enough for me (even the lightest light of most brands is too dark) and that it doesnu2019t cause skin problems!  Itu2019s waaaay more fluid than I was used to,so upon first use I was skeptical, but when it lasted all day and still looked goodu2026hurrahhhhh, I prefer the lighter formula now-and the coverage is great (& heaven knows I have issues to conceal, ha/ugh)u2026 5 stars!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation, and I didnu2019t even buy the right color! Itu2019s liquid (thin liquid), must be shaken well. Works best with setting powder, or even better with setting spray followed by setting powder. Goes on best with a foundation brush, very thin layer. Full coverage, cannot build up, but probably wonu2019t need it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted this to work for me but it just didnu2019t. Separates terribly and I cringe at the look half way through my day. I guess the search for a clean, long-wear foundations continues for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very messy and does not show up.  It barely even makes a difference. Only slightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found this foundation to be absolutely AMAZING. But there are definitely some extremely conflicting reviews which indicates to me this mixes well with some chemistries & poorly with others.  I have been looking for a good coverage foundation with some skin care properties & am very impressed and I too have bought one of about every foundation in Sephora!  I wear a mask all day at work...still...and this seems to actually not come off on the mask as much as others have. Being that I wear a mask all day at work...still...I sweat a tremendous amount & it stays on fine. I found the perfect match to my somewhere-in-between fair-light-pale medium color with the color Sunshine which is an accomplishment in itself! Separating? I don't know exactly what that looks like but it appears to stay together for me.  I have nothing but good things to say about it. Can't wait to try some of the other products in this line. Oh and I have oily to dry to combo, hormonal, 55-year-old skin.  Hope this was helpful. I truly feel it is the luck of the draw if it works for you or not!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am super picky about my foundation but I wanted to try something to make my routine a bit faster and this was the best decision. I can put it on with my hands in 2sec and it looks perfectu2026I donu2019t even need concealer with it. Just this and some blush/mascara and Iu2019m out the door. Doesnu2019t crease, change colors or slide on my face. 10/10 for me and I wonu2019t be going back to my last foundation again.

This foundation is magic. If it featherweight but provides an insane amount of coverage but looks extremely natural. The self-setting feature makes it so easy to run out the door. It almost feels like skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color i picked up was great (maybe dries down a touch yellower) but I donu2019t know that the shade range is as expansive with undertones. My usual way to wear foundation is to use tatcha liquid silk, apply with a blender , set with LM translucent (nose/ center) and HG veil everywhere else.  Then lock it all in with CT spray. I would say as far as longevity this lasted pretty well, 9 hours out and it still looks decent. My nose and chin are the first to separate and this was no exception, in fact this is one of the foundations that has a hard time sticking to those areas. However it also had the tendency to crack early on and Iu2019m wondering if it was too drying in itself. Early fall i had less issues with it than dead of winter on my combo to dry skin.  With a sponge the coverage is high medium, very lightweight on and when you shake well it still has an almost watery consistency. Bottle is a standard size for foundation but i would have preferred  a shade window on the side instead of a sticker, itu2019s very hard to tell when you get low due to the opaque packaging.   Overall while i enjoy this foundation i still reach for my ELDW if i want fuller coverage or long lasting. itu2019s just not as bullet proof on my skin type but maybe if you donu2019t have dehydrated or dry areas it would fair better . This is probably a 3.5 rounded up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, it has great coverage and feels like Iu2019m wearing nothing. I have incredibly sensitive skin and most foundation feels itchy and burns my skin, but I have no issues with this one. Itu2019s also the only foundation Iu2019ve ever used that looks better at the end of the day than when I first put it on. I do have very oily skin, so I donu2019t know if this works as well for dry skin, but itu2019s perfect for me. The fact that it looks better the longer I wear it is such a nice quality.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Shade - Bad for Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, this is the best shade match I've ever had! Unfortunately, the coverage doesn't last and it seems to crack. I do have very dry skin, so unless you also have very dry skin, my experience probably shouldn't affect your decision to buy this. I did always apply moisturizer and primer before applying.  If you do buy it, make sure you shake the bottle well as directed, otherwise it'll come out like water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of clean at Sephora foundations and I love this one! It is full coverage yet light. Lasted a full day of work without getting greasy. the finish reminds me of the Estee Lauder double wear, but without the guilt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, bc I love how it feels and originally looks, but it just couldnu2019t compete with my sweat and it would literally wipe off like paint. :/

reviews.review_title: Good color match but that's about it
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been searching for the perfect foundation for awhile, and tried this because of its high reviews. The formula is quite a bit more runny than any other full-coverage foundation I've used, so you have to be careful when opening the bottle to dispense it. It does a decent job of covering old acne marks and the like, but it didn't feel great on. Each time I've worn it, I've had that awful makeup face feeling where all you want to do is wash your face because you feel like something is sitting on it. I also found it to transfer VERY easily which I don't care for, no matter how little I used. Setting sprays also didn't really help, so I decided to move on and find another product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical when saw how liquidy this foundation was. Most full coverage products are a bit thicker. Still wasnu2019t overly impressed when applied but when it set I was very happy. I would absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never right reviews on things I like here but I was shocked with all the reviews saying this wasnu2019t full coverage or that it melts off.  I have olive skin so I have pretty dark acne marks with the tiniest of breakouts this covered those completely and whatu2019s weird is that it sets pretty matte and looks completely natural. I usually have to cake it on on those spots.  Do reference I put setting spray then the foundation and spot conceal if I feel like it then setting powder and I apply this with a dense flat top mini brush.   Like I said I never review but me having oily skin and it setting matte (lasting my manual labor shift) probably makes this my favorite foundation for when you want something natural for your everyday. Hope this helps.  In the photo I covered a part of my scar with it but I would still set this with powder as you can tell itu2019s very lightweight and natural finish. I did not get this for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I give 2 stars instead of 1 because it's clean. Other than that, it's really disappointing. The color matches great and the foundation looks amazing at first application, but after an hour in, its as if it melts away. I've tried different creams, primers, setting powder, etc., and nothing works. I really tried to make it work, but it just doesn't cut it. Company focuses too much on branding and the aesthetic than it's actual product. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not love this.  Felt like it made me look dry and not good even coverage.  Would use it on an emergency because I ran out but not purchase again for everyday use

reviews.review_title: LAWLESS, Conseal The Deal, Full Cover Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best Full-Coverage foundation that I have ever tried!  It is very light and it feels like I am wearing no foundation, however,  when I look in the mirror every flaw has seamlessly vanished!  The best thing to know is that the foundation is u201ccleanu201d.  So you can feel confident that not only are you looking flawless but there are no yucky ingredients in the foundation that you need to stay away from.  So please go for it.  I think you will be pleasantly surprised, as was I!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fawn - medium with light golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow. This is a mind blower. I've been using Laura mercier for years but decided to change it up since I started to have an allergic reaction around my nose.   This is full coverage, just like laura mercier but more skin alike. it feels very light. I shake it before using, and there is no issue. I'm very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont know about this foundation, but I don't hate it and finding a good clean foundation can be a challenge atleast in my experience.  This goes on nicely and blends well, but the fact it's self setting can cause some issues to occur if more needs added after the fact. I knowtice it plays well with alot of primers and concealers. If you have ANY dry spots...its gonna cling to it.  I have a like / dislike with this product. Stays on fairly well over time but also can cling and gather in some areas of the face such as the nose.  I wanna love it, but I think im just indifferent with this one.  To be fair my skin is going through somethings right now, but I also have used it for awhile.  Just cause it did not work for me 100% does not mean it will not work for you. I think it's still worth giving it a go if you are interested!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is great. I'm very impressed with the coverage, it looks beautiful and natural on my skin, and the staying power is pretty good (better with a primer and setting powder, though).  a few notes: shake first! it dispenses out waaaaay too oily if you don't shake it. some foundation you don't need to shake because the consistency is on the thick side--this one is not one of those foundations.  second thing: I'm very much an apply with my fingers type of makeup user. if this is you, you'll get the best results by tapping the product in your skin. rubbing just won't do it. I get the impression that this formula was made to be applied with a sponge or brush. well, I know myself, and I know my tools will never be clean, which is why I always use my freshly washed hands. but if you can handle the commitment of cleaning your brushes daily, by all means, apply this with tools. I bet a sponge would work great. actually.  I would recommend this, though for me, the application is a bit more intensive than my previously used product (a foundation stick by Pu00dcR). the coverage is impressive, though, and for me, it outdoes MAKEUP FOREVER and KVD foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hate the consistency. Itu2019s very watery, even after shaking it for god knows how long. The color was also very yellow, and didnu2019t fit my cool undertones, even though itu2019s supposed to be pink. Definitely not a fan.

reviews.review_title: If I could give it no stars, I would.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't write reviews but I believeThis is probably the worst foundation I've ever tried! It get oily on me super fast, looks patchy af when I apply it with a sponge, when I apply it with a brush, the coverage wasn't there. Plus it broke me out! Don't get me wrong, it looks beautiful when you first apply it but after that, it turns into an oily mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the more acne prone skin and MOST OILY SKIN in my life & I can honestly say I found the perfect foundation for me by far !! Doesn't make me break out and for my oily skin I can go for more than 7 hours without having to touch up !! My new #1 foundation !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found the perfect foundation for me. I've been searching for a clean foundation that ticks all the boxes and this one has done it. It's clean, the shade was a perfect match, it's not heavy, has just the right amount of coverage, and had very little transfer onto my mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bottle is very small for the amount of product needed for full coverage, and the formula is quite runny. I had to mix with other foundations for proper coverage. Three stars because this product may be better suited for those wanting light coverage. Color match is not bad. This foundation should not be in the full coverage category.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If applied right it's amazing!!! I realized I didn't need to use as much to get the coverage I needed. I don't understand the comments about people saying it's small it's literally the same amount of product as the average foundation............ so......... anyhoo, it does last long time, and really smooths out my skin, my skin is on the dryer side, so I make sure to use the hydrating primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's hard to find a clean foundation with a natural matte finish. This foundation offers great coverage with just one coat. It's light, soft, and liquid (easy to apply). It does have a slight scent, but nothing nauseating or overwhelming. Highly recommend it for those who are not fans of dewy foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was such a disappointment. I had tried their previous foundation and liked it but I normally donu2019t need a full coverage foundation so I thought this version would be perfect. I have very dry skin but no dry patches. It clinched to my skin and made it more try and made these strange patches of darker foundation spots all over my skin. I really love most of the lawless products but I was not happy with this one.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Meringue - very fair with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not good. The color was way to light for me and I am extremely fair skinned. It made me look like Casper. I felt the product was drying too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lawless was a LETDOWN. In short, this foundation sucks. I tried 2 different shades thinking maybe I had a bad batch. To start, the bottle is super small and the foundation is quite runny. I made the mistake of putting it all over my face and blending by area not realizing how quickly the formula would dry down & stick. Super difficult to blend after it dries, which is almost instantly. I am normally oily but this foundation always looks so dry & cakey. I tried hard to make it work by heavily moisturizing and priming before application but nothing helped. I really wanted to love this because Iu2019ve seen some people rave about it. Perhaps it only works for a very specific skin type. I am oily/combination and it was horrible on me. Really clings to dry spots and breaks apart leaving uneven spots and patches throughout the day. So disappointed and will be returning ASAP.

reviews.review_title: Soft on skin but harsh on purse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation was nice but very watery. It says full coverage but I needed a couple applications to actually fully cover. For the size and how much is needed I thought it was too expensive so I returned it. If Iu2019m gonna fly through it, I would wish it was less pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so badly but sadly it is not a win for me. Firstly it is super small (see photo of mini travel wipes for reference). The consistency is not there I don't know if it was the two shades I purchased but it took forever to mix them. I had done all my regular prep and prime and unfortunately, this still didn't work. I wanted to love this new serum foundation but it clung to dry patches that weren't even preciously present. It separated and was not wearable or buildable. Couldn't even wear out of the house and returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it was terrible! Dried out my skin (I already have somewhat dry skin), clogged my pores and the viscosity is very wet and doesnu2019t blend well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok foundation, I notice it pills on my face when used alone. Iu2019ve tried applying with a brush and wet beauty sponge, however, when I mix it with the IT cosmetics cc cream it goes on beautiful. This reminds me of the cover FX custom foundation drops, the foundation is pretty watery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I loved this product. Alright the coverage wasnu2019t u201cfullu201d I actually was relieved. It adds a nice glow effect and makes your skin look lovely. Only downside is how the dropped works with liquid.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Citrine - medium with light golden-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect match for my skin tone, not orangey like most clean foundations. I have combo skin, this does not cling to texture or make me look greasy. Feels comfortable on my skin all day like I have nothing on! fully covers acne but if you're expecting it to also cover your under eye circles or darker freckles it won't do that, that's why I gave it 4/5 stars. Amazing, clean foundation it being silicone-free is super important to me so happy I purchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best foundation EVER! i have this in two shades to create my own custom shade (Fawn + Palo Santo) u2014 my fave foundation Iu2019ve ever used. i use a beauty sponge to apply (the Jenny Patkinin one is the best) and can build coverage as needed. I barely need under eye concealer with this too! iu2019ve used for a few months now and wonu2019t switch to another brand u2014 plus, itu2019s clean. i set with the Lawless setting spray on top and am literally good to go for an entire day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Quite possibly the worst foundation I have ever tried, and that's saying something, because I have tried MANY!! It really couldn't be further from full coverage!! It's not even medium. I had pile on 2 coats to get even light-medium! It caused my primer to peel up (which I have used for YEARS), it clung to everything, and immediately settled into my pores. And the shades are a joke!! I am a medium neutral (with some slight yellow undertones), and they only had a light-medium or tan-medium in neutral. I got tan-medium (Tawny) and assumed I'd have to work on lightening it some. It was SOOOO yellow, it was almost orange!! Literally not even one neutral aspect at all!!! AND...it was actually too light!! I am really surprised by the good reviews on this, and it makes me suspect that some negative ones are purposely being omitted. I will be returning it immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me a really bad reaction and dried out my face after 1 use. Tried to take it back to store with the bad reaction on my face and was told nothing can be done since its past the 60 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation Iu2019ve used in a long time. Wore it for 12+ hours and I didnu2019t look crusty or anything. I have a small wrinkle above my lip that foundation almost always sinks into by the end of the day. But not with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worked great to white my face out for Halloween. Iu2019m very fair with neutral undertones, dark hair and gray eyesu2026 yet even this color was TOO light. Needs contouring to really work right & Iu2019m not much for that. At any rate the formula is great and I like that it rates as being clean. The brand and packaging  are awesome. I do have to stand the bottle up right to avoid product leaking into cap and the clean AF is rubbing off. I had a coupon and free shipping so that was good. Iu2019d recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this company so much, I love the clean ingredients so I was very excited to try this new foundation. It wears pretty well and Iu2019d say itu2019s definitely medium to full coverage. The one thing I will note is that itu2019s a very liquidy - so I find that itu2019s best to use a brush for application.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Citrine - medium with light golden-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Applies nicely, however itu2019s definitely not full coverage. I prefer the old Lawless foundation better. This is very liquidy and tends to slide right off the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is wonderful, it is light but covers really well, i work in a hot atmosphere and when i say hot i mean like 110 degrees in the summer, i have been sweating with literally sweat dripping off my face and i was super worried that my make up would disintegrate, BUT once my face dried up my make up looked flawless LOL. i know i was super impressed. i wear Fenty primer and Anastasia loose power on top and while you could tell my make up was not fresh, it looked well enough to use a freshening spray, MAC blot power and go to dinner after work. Granted it was just a casual dinner due to being after work but my make up looked really good despite what it had been thru that day. i couldn't ask for more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am an NC10 in MAC and think Seashell is a pretty good match on me. I have oily skin, so keeping this foundation on my face requires primer, lots of powder, a spray to knock down the powdery look, and another spray to set everything. Even then, it doesn't stand A CHANCE under my glasses on my nose.  It's probably better for someone with a more balanced skin type. I'll keep using it, but likely won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is awful. Probably the worst foundation I have ever used. Sorry Annie, but this ainu2019t it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden - medium-tan with warm olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This new Lawless foundation in Golden was a perfect match for me. Wore it all day and it left no streaks, there was no oily spots and it left my skin moist, no dryness. I really enjoyed it and highly recommend this to all.  Enjoy!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Truffle - very deep with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this is probably the best matching foundation that Iu2019ve ever tried. Many foundation sometimes are off whether  it be the undertone or the overall depth of the foundation. I was able to pick up a sample and try it for the first time, I have yet to do a wear test, however like many have expressed, this foundation is light weight. Considering how many foundations I have tried, chefs kiss to this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This just did not look good on my skin at all.  There was zero coverage and it turned a bit dry and powdery as it set. I promise you this is not full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks beautiful.. but  itu2019s not self setting. Itu2019s definitely not transfer proof either. You will need a primer and setting spray to make it last all day. The shades are off too, so I recommend you buy this in store and get matched.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awful. No coverage and didnu2019t blend well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not full coverage whatsoever. Iu2019m nearly 30 years old and this settles into fine lines like Iu2019ve never seen before, clings to areas while sitting so weird on the skin, and I have normal skin; not oily and not dry. Tried to apply bronzer and the foundation just washed away and got patchy. The only positive is that it is the most comfortable and lightweight foundation Iu2019ve ever used. Feels like absolutely nothing is on the skin. But with all the negatives I experienced, I would never purchase this tiny bottle of foundation for the price. If you have perfect skin and want a tiny bit of coverage, this might be for you if you can justify the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation.  Great coverage without the heaviness. I have hyperpigmentation and it was completely covered with just a small amount of foundation. To be honest, the Lawless foundation brush that is meant for this foundation does not work that well.  I tried it and was not happy with the application.  When I switched to my Artis brush (super dense bristles), it was perfect.  It did take me awhile to find my shade.  I now have two other shades that are a bit lighter, but I think they will work well in a couple of months or mixed in with a bit of darker foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ALMOST gave up on this foundation after several rounds of experimenting with shades and application techniques on my combination skin. When I applied Fawn with my fingertips or even the foundation brush I purchased from the Lawless website, it went on almost ghostly whiteu2014very chalky and streaky, yielding sheer/light coverage at best, and it absorbed/dried too fast to be able to blend it out properly. When I applied with a Beauty Blender sponge and stamped it into my skin instead, it applied BEAUTIFULLY, leaving a smooth, even, matte finish and perfect color match. What a difference! Glad I didn't give up on it. Iu2019ve read reviews about the small packaging, but the product volume is a very standard, 1-fluid-ounce size. That said, itu2019s medium coverage, so if youu2019re looking for full coverage (as itu2019s marketed), youu2019ll need more product to build to full coverage. From that standpoint, it may not be worth the price tag for some. Staying power is also medium; I use a loose setting powder and the Lawless Glam Guard spray, which help. Not a holy grail for me quite yet, but itu2019s definitely one of the higher-performing u201ccleanu201d foundations I've come across as a foundation junkie. Worth a try and Iu2019d repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how much I love this foundation.  It looks natural and can be built up to full coverage.  I have a few sun spots and it covered them without looking like I had a lot of makeup on.  I highly recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation as well as Nars Sheer Glow are the only two Iu2019ve ever found that lays natural looking on my super dry and sensitive skin. I like this one better than Nars for the ingredients and that I can use Lawless under my eyes as concealer with no creasing! I fit in the first three shades depending on the look Iu2019m going for and that never happens with foundations! I usually only fit in the very first or none at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is not light with golden-olive, its basically fair almost white

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d give this foundation 0 stars.  Absolutely the worst foundation Iu2019ve ever used.  No coverage, doesnu2019t blend and sits on top of the skin.  The colors are also off.  Iu2019m a medium neutral and fawn was like white on my skin.  Do not purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand all the great reviews of this foundation. Itu2019s a tiny bottle. Coverage is non existent and it sits funny on the skin.  I have combo skin so maybe that is the problem? Iu2019ve tried everything to make this foundation look good and nothing works.

reviews.review_title: Love the formula, shade matching is difficult
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this formula, but I did have a hard time trying to find a shade match. Fawn is a fairly close match for me - and I am 5.5 in Armani, BD40 in YSL All Hours, and 4 in Kosas. I wonder if Dune would be a better match, but I'm going to use up Fawn before I try Dune.   For all of the comments re the size - the number of ounces is exactly the same as other foundations. The size of the packaging has nothing to do with the amount of product you are getting. Make sure you check the oz before you leave a negative review based on size alone! I did prefer the previous glass packaging (and still love the old formula as well), but I appreciate that they are trying to reduce the size of the plastic packaging with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the finish on this foundation but I canu2019t get the right shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe if I had perfect skin this would be okay? I got this because Iu2019m obsessed with their primer. This foundation is not full coverage AT ALL. It goes on like water and I have to use so much concealer over it to cover anything. It may be fine on someone with perfect skin, no acne ever, and zero dryness, but this did not work for me. By the time I get home from work, my redness is peeking through and it looks like I donu2019t have anything on. One of the worst foundations Iu2019ve tried. :(

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Dune - medium with warm peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous lightweight matte foundation. I wish it had more cool tones but I canu2019t make it work. What I find funny is all the comments about the size. Itu2019s 1 ounce just like every foundation. They just donu2019t oversized the packaging with excess plastic waste to make you feel like youu2019re getting more. Read weights people. Packaging is deceiving. This is matte but not drying. It doesnu2019t budge once set and has an almost powdery look. No setting powder required.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product! The application is beautiful no lie I was so excited but once it hit 2 hours it started to break apart. I have oily skin so didnu2019t last long at all. I use milk primer which I LOVE I tired different primer just in case but the foundation didnu2019t stay long as it claims and It does oxidize. At the store the color match my skin but once I left I notice a huge difference between the color change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to support Annie and the re-launch of the original foundation that I loved. However, the formula is now changed to a noticeably thinner, lower-coverage variety, and the packaging from glass to weaker plastic. I love that the formula is cleaner than some drugstore brands, but it now doesnu2019t cover as well, Iu2019m using more product, and it doesnu2019t feel luxe anymoreu2026 all for the same price as Dior?

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Citrine - medium with light golden-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is smaller than most foundations but you donu2019t need a lot of product so Iu2019m sure it will last fine. The formula is not as thick as other full coverage foundations which I personally prefer. It has a matte finish so if you have dry skin it may be too drying for you. I really like how light it feels on my skin. It doesnu2019t feel like Iu2019m wearing makeup which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When my product arrived, I had to double check that I hadnu2019t accidentally purchased the travel size. The bottle is painfully tiny for the price tag, but fortunately the formula is magic. It blends seamlessly. Itu2019s incredibly lightweight yet covers fully. It leaves no shine behind and seems to set itself without powder or spray. The ONLY thing I didnu2019t like was the shade range. Iu2019m pretty pale, but u201cvery fairu201d was basically white. Like chalk. I have to return for a different shade, but disappointed to see a lot of pinks and peaches but very little neutrals. I would definitely recommend doing your homework on which shade would be best before taking the purchase dive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this foundation...it is extremely light weight I can barely feel it. And it looks so natural... I have combo skin and work in a humid environment and this stayed matte on me all day..it is medium coverage so all your imperfections wont be covered but it truly is beautiful. also the shade range is awesome. there are a few shades I can wear in this line so the shades are kind of flexible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This flat out didnu2019t work for me *at all*. I tried a couple shades during the foundation sale hoping I could find a good match. They appear in swatches to dry down darker, and I was worried the shades I chose would be too dark, but I ended up having the opposite problem. They were still too light, even 30 mins after application. Still, shade wasnu2019t the biggest issue I had. This formula did work for me. I never could achieve the claimed full coverage, even with multiple layers, it didnu2019t blend well, it streaked, and though thin in texture, it just sort of sat there. I tried several application methods and different primers and moisturizers. I would call it similar in texture to Marc Jacobs remarcable, but I like that one. It seems people do like this, but I would caution people that itu2019s not going to be for everyone. Iu2019m returning it today.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: feels like nothing is on your skin, full coverage   Cons: very matte finish so for anyone with dry skin, make sure you have a good moisturizer underneath. You have to really work on blending it, drys very fast so if use wet sponge and blend immediately.   Overall good foundation, wish it blended more easy and wasnu2019t such a matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is quite off for me. I purchased Sesame (light-medium neutral) and I understand itu2019s suppose to dry and be darker but even with the dry down this was very ghostly. My best shade matches are CT flawless foundation in 5cool, Rare beauty 210N & GA luminous silk 5.5 to name a few. It does have a very thin texture but I donu2019t find anything special about it. Itu2019s an ok foundation with light to medium coverage, def not full coverage. I even built it with 2 layers and still didnu2019t get full coverage. Which Iu2019m fine with because I tend to like more medium coverage anyway but itu2019s marketed as FULL coverage. Itu2019s a miss for me! I have dry skin btw and it did feel a little dry around my mouth (which is my driest area). Returning tomorrow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Palo Santo - medium-tan with soft peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely am in love with this foundation. Stays on like Estee Lauder double wear foundation but feels soooo light on the skin like you're not even wearing makeup. I have combo skin and I don't like oily or shiny midday. I love all the benefits of this foundation. I 10/10 recommend and will continue to always buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this and decided to try it in my morning return before work lol I should have known better I had to scrub it off just before because I had no time to fix it anymore. I didnu2019t know it was so runny but the description does say like a serum , my skin was absorbing it so fast even after putting a primer it was drying and actually highlighting imperfections on my face rather than hiding and smoothing it, it was a nightmare very disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Worth trying if youu2019re looking for something new
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yea itu2019s pretty good. Itu2019s lightweight and matte but not in a bad, cakey way. Itu2019s also a good primer for the rest of your makeup. Iu2019m giving 4 stars rather than 5 because the bottle is pretty small. Needs a little more product to be worth the price IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful! Natural and feels like nothing on your skin. Gorgeous finish. Love this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly donu2019t understand how it has such great reviews! Hard let covers anything.. chalky.. chunky almost. Settles in lines. Terrible. Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Finally, a clean foundation with a matte finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy to find a clean foundation with a matte finish. At last! Goes on so beautifully and lasts forever too. I love the coverage. Shade is a tad light for me, but I can work with it and use bronzer. So glad Lawless came up with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation isn't the your typical liquid foundation is super thin and pigmented. Buildable coverage from medium to full and hydrating sinks into skin really well without making it look caked up while being Long lasting really loving this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful skin it is gorgeous I love Do not understand bad reviews but then again everyone is different

reviews.review_title: doesnu2019t work at alllll for me. NOT longwearing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I buy a product for fifty dollars, I expect it to do what it says, and be of that high-price quality. From first inspection it felt cheap to me and printing on the bottle was crooked. It reminds me most of the dumpster fire that was the ____ cutesty happy/smile foundation (hint: the brand is very pink and rhymes with Lemifet) The idea for this product was great but the execution wasnu2019t there for me. No matter how much I tried to make it work - it doesnu2019t set. And even with another brandu2019s expensive clean setting powder it doesnu2019t set. With my last foundation I never had the smudging and transfer onto my mask and that I did after a few hours of wearing this. The consistency is nice but because it doesnu2019t really set properly, if you try and build on it, the foundation is removed. Same if you try and apply concealer after applying this foundation. Really not impressed and unfortunately Iu2019ll be returning this and going back to my Double Wear. And not to pile on, but this came off really patchy throughout the day - if you have dry or combo skin with any dry patches/acne, avoid this. I noticed it did make me breakout as well. Bummed this didnu2019t work. Save your money. The search for a truly amazing, non-comedogenic, full coverage, transfer-resistant and long wearing clean, vegan foundation continuesu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start off- I purchased this with my own money.  I did buy it on the 20% foundation sale, otherwise I probably wouldnu2019t have bought it because I did not like the Lawless u201cWoke Up Like Thisu201d foundation, but I can tell you that I would absolutely pay full price for this. To be honest, this is not full coverage at first pass- especially if using a sponge which I would not recommend. I used the NYX canu2019t stop brush and it applied light to medium. I did do a second pass and I was so impressed at how it then became full coverage without looking caked on. Now I do have dry skin and I love a natural finish, and thatu2019s one of the reasons I chose to buy this. It definitely has a natural finish but there is a dewy sheen and I really like it. Normally Iu2019m not crazy about overly dewy foundations but the finish of this is beautiful. Also, I have mild rosacea and it totally covered it up with the second pass. For primer I used the UD All Nighter primer but Iu2019m going to try it with the Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen and Glowscreen, which are my favorites. Iu2019ve seen videos on YouTube that have used no primer and it looked great, but I always always use a primer. All in all, my first impression is that this is a beautiful foundation that looks natural. Iu2019m happy I purchased it on the sale but when I run out Iu2019ll purchase full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This packaging is extremely cheap and the product has nothing unique about it. Its very watery and comes out fast. I am disappointed because of the price point. This should be twice the size or half the price. I understand we are paying for clean products and they chose to save money on packaging, but this whole thing feels like your margins are insane and we are suckers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've got Conseal The Deal Foundation complimentary by Lawless Beauty in the shade Sesame. The shade is beautiful and perfectly adapted to my skin color. This foundation really gives full coverage without emphasizing my pores and feels great on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I bought this because I kept seeing influencers (likely paid) saying it actually 'set' on its own - no powder.  Untrue.  I tried it on my *arm* (with nothing else on it) and waited 30 minutes... still sticky.  Now - that said - it's a nice foundation.  But for the price - honestly - Colourpop is about the same and costs about 1/3 the price.  sorry, Lawless - you are just another above average foundation with a with a way above average price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how lightweight this foundation felt on my skin. I would say it's a medium- buildavle coverage foundation. I have combination oily skin with large pores and it did not emphasize them. It covered my redness pretty well which is my main concern- to even out the skin tone. It also lasted me a long day of wear so I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My honest review for the Conseal The Deal Foundation by Lawless Beauty in the shade Champagne. I have to say that the foundation was underwhelming. It was chunky and smelled weird. Made my skin feel dry and I had to instantly take it off right after applying. I do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Conseal The Deal Foundation by Lawless Beauty in the shade Seashell. I personally did not enjoy this foundation. The concealer was way to thick and made me feel so cakey. It seemed a bit old to me to be honest. And you have to press really hard on the bottle to get it out. Super disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is super pretty and felt nice on my skin. It fit my skin tone pretty well and was not greasy at all. I definitely recommend this lawless beauty foundation. I got it complimentary but loved it and plan on purchasing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how blendable it is, lightweight and really, I didnu2019t even feel it on my face. Itu2019s like Iu2019m a bare faced, but with coverage. The shade fits me perfectly fine and I didnu2019t have a problem to choose mine according to the listed tones. I like how breathable it is, for full coverage foundation itu2019s a big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this foundation. The packaging was sleek and simple and I could keep it out on my counter. I liked the consistency of the foundation as well, as i have oily skin and sometimes foundations can be too heavy for my skin. I felt comfortable and even after a few hours,my skin did not look cakey or patchy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Coco - ultra deep with warm-neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have to forgo full coverage when I reach for a more lightweight, fluid formula. Lawless's Conseal the Deal Long-Wear Full-Coverage Foundation feels more like a serum than a foundation but blurs the appearance of pores and uneven texture, all while providing an extremely natural-looking veil of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw many bloggers raving about this foundation online and was so excited I got the chance to try it! Itu2019s such a good full coverage foundation that isnu2019t cakey and at least for me it didnu2019t settle into my problem areas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the past few weeks this foundation was my go to! Literally flawless coverage, barely noticeable, goes well with my concealer and blends in seconds. I love that it requires a little bit of the product, which means it will last long. Totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time hearing of Lawless so I was excited to try out this foundation! This is buildable and has more of a u201cno make-upu201d makeup look. The foundation blends very well and the packing is simple, yet cute. Being a vegan product is a huge plus as well!

reviews.review_title: My Experience With The Conseal The Deal Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this Lawless  Conseal The Deal Foundation. I usually do not like to wear foundation because they fill very heavy on my skin but it wasn't the case with this  Conseal The Deal Foundation. The formula and the texture of the products is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. It had really good coverage and lasted a long time with no cakenyness. I didnt quite get the right shade but that was my fault. I definitely will be getting again in the future in my correct shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this is a very long-wearing, clean foundation!  It is full-coverage but does not feel like full coverage. It applies to my skin so well onto (and into) my skin and I do not even need powder on top.  The coverage is seamless and feels like a serum and my skin felt smooth and did not feel cakey at all. It is easy to apply and is super blendable.  I am impressed at how well this foundation covered my pores and a couple of pimples. Oh and also the bottle is so interesting.  It reminds me of a perfume bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am feeling mixed emotions from this foundation. Does it last all day on my oily skin? Yes. Wonderful. However, the shade range is off and it looks a bit cakey on my skin. I dermaplane and exfoliate often, so itu2019s no issue with my skin texture. Back to the shade range - I am light-medium skin tone. I ordered the shade Sunlight. It is wayyy too light for me. I know it oxidizes once itu2019s set, but it was still light. Ordered another in the shade Dune and itu2019s still a little light. Shades are definitely off. Otherwise a decent foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewood - very deep with reddish undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing long lasting makeup base, I love that it is matte and that I can use it on my oily skin, the coverage is great, the color I chose is a little brown for me, but I applied it on my face to do this review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t know which was my shade so I went with sheashell. Pretty good coverage, although it is a little too light for me but thatu2019s fine I can mix with other shades. I noticed a quick shake is needed to use the foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Lawless Conseal The Deal Long-Wear Full Coverage Foundation is a very good product! It is composed of a fluid formula that is extremely lightweight, blends fairly well on the skin upon application, and delivers a natural finish. The coverage of this foundation is medium; however, it is very buildable, does not cake nor separate, and self-sets. Lastly, this product is vegan and free of silicones. Overall, I recommend this product as it is easy to apply, feels very light on the skin, and the end result is a natural appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage but color match could be better.  Very natural finish looks great, however the shade is too dark unfortunately. But it is long lasting, doesn't transfer, and blends well with other products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never heard of Lawless beauty and was very excited to try this foundation! The packaging was very cute and chic. The foundation has very minimal coverage and can be good for summer months. It doesnu2019t really cover up any pores. Definitely more for that no makeup look. I went with a color description that usually works for my skin tone but it made me look very yellow and jaundiced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I purchased this with my own money from the lawless website the day it launched. Unfortunately it did not work for me. When first applied it looked beautiful and did have good coverage but after a few hours it broke up around my mouth and nose looking very dry. I wore it to work and couldnu2019t wait to get home to wash it off because of how bad it looked. It also sunk into lines I didnu2019t know I had! Such a bummer because the ingredients are great and it is fragrance free but I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Brand: Lawless Longware Foundation Color number: Sandalwood Skin: dry  Thanks so much for giving me the opportunity to try the foundation.  The packaging is very classy and the bottles are frosted and textured. When choosing the color number, there is no light color. But I think this color can be used as a shadow to modify the face and make up more three-dimensional. It's very fluid, very easy to push.   One thing I really like about this product is long-ware foundation which means moisturizing and being able to maintain your look throughout the day is important. All in all, it's a great product. Thanks again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is okay for a normal day to day use but not amazing for a glam makeup look or a full coverage itu2019s easy to use and has a lot of color variety but I can say itu2019s not my first choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was beautiful I would definitely say more of a medium coverage then a full coverage but it was easy to use just didnu2019t cover as much as Iu2019d like definitely nice tho if you donu2019t want a full fancy makeup look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Flawless foundation consistency is very watery to my liking. It is buildable if you want full coverage; I, unfortunately, had a shade lighter than I am, so I use it for contouring. Overall, feels good, and I love the bottle, but I found it is more suitable for non-oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, it works really good for my oily skin. The matte coverage is amazing, I love how this smoothed my skin texture out and was super easy to blend. I recommend this foundation 100%!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have received Lawless Conseal the deal long wear full coverage foundation for my honest review. I received it and it doesnu2019t match my skin at all but I highly recommend it to anybody else. The packaging was great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving this foundation. Iu2019ve dry combo skin and my skin tone is uneven, I canu2019t say itu2019s full coverage foundation but covers nicely uneven patches on skin. The texture is little runny but I love how it give me natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice foundation, has a good coverage and looks natural on the skin, it doesnu2019t feel too heavy The only problem I didnu2019t choose the right color for my face, but in general a good foundation  I do like it

The only reason Iu2019m giving it 3 stars is because it does look absolutely beautiful on the skin once applied, and has no obnoxious scent, and dries down nicely. That said, though, they missed the mark big time for me. Itu2019s marketed as if this is the holy grail and itu2019s just a disappointment. Iu2019ll be returning.

reviews.review_title: Light & comfortable-better for normal to dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wear a basic u201cfairu201d foundation with a cool rosy undertone, unfortunately this foundation only has u201cvery fairu201d or u201clightu201d with pink/rosy undertones so I went with u201cMeringue: very fair with pink undertonesu201d which is a shade lighter than my usual tone. Fortunately for me it dries down a little darker than it looks so I was able to make it work. It is comfortable to wear; very light with a liquidy consistency that makes it easy to blend. I felt this would be better for someone with normal to dry skin as I did have a bit of oiliness as the day went on and found myself patting it dry. I did not have any cakey spots or cracking whatsoever which is usually the kiss of death for foundations. It gives a pretty decent full coverage based on how much you build it and work with it. I did find the product to be a little small based on price but I realized that most higher end foundations are similar size. All in all itu2019s a good and comfortable foundation, but it would be optimal for someone with skin that doesnu2019t get as oily as mine so I will be saving this for use during the winter when my skin is drier :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the free/ complimentary sample of Conceal The Deal Foundation - Suede from Lawless Beauty for testing and review purposes.  This is a long-wearing, lightweight fluid foundation that delivers modern full coverage with a self-setting, natural-matte finish.  Further, this foundation is vegan and silicone-free.  The ingredients in this foundation are Nasturtium Flower Extract which limits free-radical damage caused by blue light, Goji Berry which is rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants and is used to reduce visible signs of aging and Bisabolol and Ginger Extracts which gives soothing anti-irritants suitable for dry, sensitive skin.  I love using this foundation which has made my skin so much better.  I have already recommended it to many of my friends and family and several of them have already purchased and used it, and they all love using this amazing foundation a lot.
